name: colorfun (itch) (jackomix)
description:
(famicase link)

colorfun is a game created for a game by its cover 2019 game jam.

use the mouse wheel to change the color of the square in the middle. match it with the color of the background, and then press any key. do this before the timer (shown at the top) runs out or you lose a life (shown via the squares size). you also lose a life if you get the colors wrong. if you lose all your 3 lifes, you game over and your score is shown at the bottom.
